      • unescapeQuotes

        public static String unescapeQuotes(String s)
        Unescapes escaped double quotes in a string, i.e. replaces \" by " and \\ by \.
        Parameters:
        s - the string in which to unescape double quotes.
        Returns:
        the unescaped string.

      • escapeQuotes

        public static String escapeQuotes(String s)
        Escapes double quotes in a string. Effectively, " is replaced by \" and \ is replaced by \\.
        Parameters:
        s - the string to escape.
        Returns:
        the escaped string.
